title: The Opening Is the Most Exciting Moment
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Alright, Kanata is going to open it. Are you ready?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah.... It’s finally time....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata is getting a little bit nervous too....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Kanata-san, whether we cry or we laugh, the result is already decided! Let’s just open it with all our might.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>You’re right, Hanayo-chan. Okay then, here we go, one, two, open!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Waaaah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oooooh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It’s a big success, Kanata-san! What a beautiful light brown color! To think this bread is made from rice.... It’s the best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Thank goodness it went well~. Kanata doesn’t really make much homemade bread out of rice flour, so Kanata was worried whether the rice-loving Hanayo-chan would like it or not~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It absolutely is going to be delicious! I can tell just from looking at it!! Hey, Kanata-san, let’s hurry up and eat it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
